headline: Curaleaf Holdings (TSX:CURA) Sees 205% Q3 Price Surge
summary: Curaleaf Holdings (TSX:CURA) recently celebrated the opening of a new dispensary in Westerville, Ohio, increasing its footprint within the state and reflecting its ongoing expansion strategy. This move, combined with strategic executive appointments, highlights the company's focus on enhancing its retail presence. Despite a reported 205% share price increase last quarter, Curaleaf faced declining revenue and an increasing net loss in Q2 2025. This mixed performance resonates with broader...
